setting.name: muraScopeNamespace
setting.label: Mura Scope Namespace
setting.hint: The namespace is the key you will use to access your Mach-II application from the Mura scope. (i.e. $.{muraScopeNamespace}.methodName(argumentCollection=args).someMethod)

setting.name: MACHII_CONFIG_PATH
setting.label: Mach-II Config Path
setting.hint: Set the path to the application's mach-ii.xml file.

setting.name: MACHII_CONFIG_MODE
setting.label: Mach-II Config Mode
setting.hint: Set the configuration mode (when to reload): -1=never, 0=dynamic, 1=always

setting.name: MACHII_APP_KEY
setting.label: Mach-II App Key
setting.hint: Set the app key for sub-applications within a single cf-application.

setting.name: MACHII_VALIDATE_XML
setting.label: Mach-II Validate XML
setting.hint: Set the app key for sub-applications within a single cf-application.

setting.name: MACHII_DTD_PATH
setting.label: Mach-II Validate XML
setting.hint: Set the path to the Mach-II's DTD file. Default to /MachII/mach-ii_1_9_0.dtd if left as "".

setting.name: MACHII_ONLOAD_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
setting.label: Mach-II On Load Request Timeout
setting.hint: Set the path to the Mach-II's DTD file. Default to /MachII/mach-ii_1_Set the request timeout for loading of the framework. Defaults to 240.

setting.name: MACHII_HANDLE_ONLOAD
setting.label: Mach-II Handle On Load
setting.hint: Set if the framework should serve a "loading" template.

setting.name: MACHII_ONLOAD_TEMPLATE
setting.label: Mach-II On Load Template
setting.hint: - Set the template to show for loading of the framework. Defaults to Mach-II default template if left as "".

setting.name: MACHII_ONLOAD_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
setting.label: Mach-II On Load Request Timeout
setting.hint: Set the path to the Mach-II's DTD file. Default to /MachII/mach-ii_1_Set the request timeout for loading of the framework. Defaults to 240.
